item.title: Create an R package Basic
item.description: This is a blog describing my first experience creating a simple R package on class STAT 585 at ISU. Basic Workflow Create a basic R package in R studio using New Project - New Dictionary - R Package Write functions in R/FuncName.R, including roxygen comments at the beginning of each function. Run devtools::document() to update NAMESPACE and man/FuncName.Rd Run usethis::use_package(“package”,type=“Import”) to update the DESCRIPTION
